testcase.name: task:2 :The bonusForProductsSold method returns the right result
task:3 :The finalSalary method returns the correct result capped at maximum salary
task:3 :The finalSalary method returns the regular salary without multiplier and bonus
task:2 :The bonusMultiplier method returns 10 when productsSold is below the threshold
task:2 :The bonusMultiplier method returns 13 when productsSold is equal to the threshold
task:2 :The bonusMultiplier method returns 13 when productsSold is above the threshold
task:1 :The salaryMultiplier method returns 1.0 when daysSkipped is below the threshold
task:1 :The salaryMultiplier method returns 0.85 when daysSkipped is equal to the threshold
task:1 :The bonusMultiplier method returns 0.85 when daysSkipped is above the threshold
task:3 :The finalSalary method returns the correct result when daysSkipped above threshold
task:3 :The finalSalary method returns the correct result when daysSkipped and productsSold below threshold
